name: Realms
intro: Massively multiplayer on-chain game of Economics and Chivalry
introduce: Realms is a massively multiplayer on-chain game of Economics and Chivalry. All the resources (and many other assets) within this gameworld are user-owned tradable tokens. Players use these resources to create buildings and troops to improve and defend their Realm, and pillage resources from others in your quest for greatness.
